video_prompt: An ethereal deer-like creature moves through a cosmic night. Its luminous body shimmers with starlight. Glowing antlers sway,  star-shaped ornaments dangle and strings of light undulate. A luminous garland swirls around its form. A vibrant purple comet streaks across the starry sky. Mist billows and glows underfoot as patterned light shifts on the ground. The creature breathes, its eyes subtly brightening and dimming.
image_prompt: A majestic, ethereal, deer-like creature with a luminous blue/indigo, starlight-speckled coat stands on misty, rainbow clouds under a dark blue night sky. Its pure white, glowing antlers are adorned with dangling lights and star ornaments. White glowing eyes and a swirling garland of lights encircle its body. The sky is full of white stars, with a vibrant purple comet streaking in the upper right. Magical, celestial, fantasy art, dreamlike.
refined_video_prompt: An ethereal deer-like creature glides through a cosmic night. Its luminous body shimmers, starlight catching its form. Glowing antlers sway, star ornaments dangle, and light strings undulate. A luminous garland swirls. A vibrant purple comet streaks across the starry sky. Mist billows and glows underfoot, as patterned light shifts on the ground. The creature breathes, eyes subtly brightening and dimming.
